name: Rakshasa, Servitor
description: The Rakshasa, Servitor is a medium-sized fiend known for its cunning, with a humanoid appearance marked by feline features and a stylish demeanor.
memorable: It possesses Limited Magic Immunity and a unique reaction ability to protect its allies.
goals: To manipulate encounters and protect fellow rakshasas in battle.
relations: Often allied with other rakshasas and serves their interests.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy locations or urban settings where deception thrives.
strengths: Immunity to cantrips and advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to piercing damage from magic weapons wielded by good-aligned creatures.
attacks: Attacks with a dagger or hand crossbow, dealing piercing damage combined with poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Limited Magic Immunity, making it difficult to target with spells.
senses: It possesses darkvision allowing it to see in darkness up to 60 feet, and has a passive perception score of 14.
skills: Demonstrates proficiency in perception, making it slightly above average in noticing hidden or moving objects.
additional_information: Capable of spellcasting without requiring material components.
Can cast detect thoughts at will, enabling mind reading.
Has the ability to disguise itself at will.
Can instill fear in targets with cause fear.
Its Protecting Pounce ability allows it to absorb damage for its allies.
spellcasting: Can cast at will: detect thoughts and disguise self; once per day: cause fear.
test_queries: mysterious feline humanoid with magical abilities
tactical fiend that can read minds
